lines.text: Hey kid. Why do you wear sunglasses at night?
Because when you're cool, the sun shine on you 24 hours a day.
Morituri te salutamos.
Yo, Sherman, what's he sayin'?
He's going to kick our ass.
I'm cool, you're cool, we're cool, thank you, good night!
Hey, I hit on Sawyer once.
Oh yeah.
Yeah, I tried to give her this Italian macho bod.
What did she do?
Poor girl lost out. She called me a name I had to look up in the Dictionary!
What's your name, cowboy?
Robert Roberts, Esquire to you, honky!
My old man says, "Treat broads like dirt and they love ya."
Oh, yeah? So where's your old lady?
My parents are divorced.
I just want to be home watching cartoons!
This plant has been extinct for sixty billion years!
Yeah? Well I ain't ever seen one before!

[gives the finger to another driver]
Sit on this, buttplug!

[at the school library counter]
We need a book.
Oh, a car book?

[mockingly]
A car book?
No, a book on strange things.
Like Vince.

[grabs Sherman]
Hey, syonara dicknose!
Son of a bitch, whaddaya call this wawa?
I believe you'd call him a Neanderthal man.
Well I don't care what country he's from! One shot to the chones an' he's down!

[after testing the gizmo with a metal detector, which goes haywire and shorts out]
It's not real. I mean... it's some sort of, it's some sort of power plant. My machine's gotta be broken.
Bob, why would your machine be broken?
Because if it isn't broken Michael, this thing you found is older than earth!
You guys skipped my science finals today! Where were you?
We got kinda hung up in the auto shop...
Yeah, in the ozone.
In the ozone, Blowzone! Now look, I'm tired of you two. Let me tell you something, unless your science project is dyno-supreme
[pauses]
you both get D's!

[eagerly]
Hey I'll take it!
Michael, I want to be worshipped, serenaded like a goddess.
Oh come on, bullshit.
That is exactly what my Cosmo Romantiscope told me you'd say Michael.
[she walks away leaving him with the magazine]

[puzzled]
Ro- Romantiscope?

[smiling and waving to the camera with shades on while taking his mugshot]
Hi, mom!
You dirty little cockroach...
Why what's the matter, I got boogers?
[finger up his nose]

[in his face]
Kid, why do you wear your sunglasses at night?
Because when you're COOL... the sun shines on you twenty-four hours a DAY!

[rips off his shades]
Oh, yeah?
[stiff-arms him against the wall and walks away]
Chill out, Butch... and get a shave.
Danger makes great sex. Catch you guys later!
Latello, wait!
Hey! These are all optical dillusions. Like ghosts, so it's cool!
[calling into the fog]
Here comes Latello, YO!
[Neanderthal Man jumps out and attacks]

[while being chased by police]
What are we going to do?
About one to five with good behavior.
Caps to the dynamite, dynamite to the legs, got it?
Caps to the dynamite, dynamite to the legs, got it.
Latello?
Caps to the legs, legs to the dynamite.
Come on!
Hey, good thing I watch TV, huh?
I don't believe this! I could be home watchin' Magnum!
Will you stop whining?
WHINING? BARNEY RUBBLE JUST TRIED TO FLAME ME OUT!

[Digging in the trunk of the police car]
I'm comin', I'm comin'. But if I'm gonna get sucked into a time/space warp like Bob-o-rino...
[whips out a shotgun and cocks it]
I'm goin' in there packin'!
Oooh, brief me!
It flew in and made a mockery of our defensive manoeuvres.
I don't see that either, right?
Get rid of it.
This thing is creating light and energy without heat, Michael!
How is that possible?
It's not possible! Not in this World, anyway.
Whoa, what other World are we talking about?
